name: KyuBid Online Dating
overview: KyuBid is an innovative new dating site based on the concept of â€œbidding for datesâ€. Members create dates they would like to go on and then describe the ideal person they would like to join them on that date. Members who match the desired profile are then invited to â€œbidâ€ for that date. When bidding closes, the member who created that date will choose one of the bidders to go on the date with them. To match members on dates, KyuBid uses a bespoke matching algorithm which takes into account the desired profile specified by the date creator as well and input to a 5-point member profiling system
